title: American intellectual Noam Chomsky says Israel’s treatment of Palestinians is ‘worse than apartheid’
description:
“I’ve never called it apartheid because it’s worse than apartheid.”

American intellectual Noam Chomsky said on Saturday during an interview with Richard Medhurst that he believes Israel’s treatment of Palestinians is worse than apartheid when asked about his thoughts on anti-government protests in Israel
